entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brochet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
